CAMPAIGN.SIDEBAR_TXT: Proactive messages allow the customer to send outbound messages to their contacts which would trigger more conversations. Click on Add Campaign to create a new campaign. You can also edit or delete an existing campaign by clicking on the Edit or Delete button.

MODAL.TITLE: Choose how to send
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Select how you'd like to send this one-off campaign.

ADD.TITLE: Create a campaign
ADD.DESC: Proactive messages allow the customer to send outbound messages to their contacts which would trigger more conversations.

TITLE.LABEL: Title
TITLE.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter the title of campaign

CONTACT_LIST.LABEL: Upload Contact List
CONTACT_LIST.ERROR_NO_COLUMN: The 'numbers' column was not found in the spreadsheet.
CONTACT_LIST.ERROR_UPLOAD: An error occurred while uploading the file. Please try again.
CONTACT_LIST.SUCCESS_UPLOAD: File uploaded successfully. You will be notified when processing is complete.
CONTACT_LIST.PLACEHOLDER: Select an Excel or CSV file
CONTACT_LIST.ERROR_MISSING_DDD: Invalid number: missing or incorrect area code
CONTACT_LIST.ERROR_BRAZILIAN_FORMAT: Brazilian numbers should only contain area code and number
CONTACT_LIST.INFO_INTERNATIONAL: International number detected. Brazilian validation will be skipped
CONTACT_LIST.ERROR_TOO_MANY_INVALID: Too many invalid numbers ({count}). Please check the format.

MESSAGE.LABEL: Message
MESSAGE.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter the message of campaign

SENT_BY.LABEL: Sent by
SENT_BY.PLACEHOLDER: Please select the the content of campaign

FORM.ERROR_BOTH_AUDIENCE_AND_CONTACTS: Please select either audience or contact list, not both.
FORM.ERROR_NO_AUDIENCE_OR_CONTACTS: You need to select the audience or contact list.

SHOW_IN_SYSTEM.LABEL: Only on WhatsApp
SHOW_IN_SYSTEM.TOOLTIP: When enabled, messages will appear both in WhatsApp and in the system. If disabled, messages will only appear in WhatsApp.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error. Please try again.
Could not delete the campaign. Please try again later.

EDIT.TITLE: Edit campaign
EDIT.DESC: Review and edit this campaign. Changes made here may affect communication with your contacts.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error, please try again

LIST.404: There are no campaigns created for this inbox.

ONE_OFF.404: There are no one off campaigns created
ONE_OFF.INBOXES_NOT_FOUND: Please create an sms inbox and start adding campaigns

ONGOING.404: There are no ongoing campaigns created
ONGOING.INBOXES_NOT_FOUND: Please create an website inbox and start adding campaigns
